msg: Merge r27590:27605 from trunk, resolving some conflicts due to r27595.

author: lgo
msg: Fix issues in the switch-peg-revision feature.
(svn_client__switch_internal): find the url as existed in peg_rev, use this
url as target for further operations.
(switch_change_repos_root): extend the test. The existing test was actually
trying to switch to a repo that doesn't exist. This is now giving a clearer
error message. Add a testcase to test a url that exists, but is from a

author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #1643: make 'svn cp -rBASE filea fileb' work.
(setup_copy): If the peg or operative revisions are BASE, replace them with
the revision taken from the object's wc entry.
(revision_kinds_local_source): Test the case where 'BASE' is used as a peg
